subject: p11569093
Findings: As compared to the previous radiograph, there is no relevant change. Large fluid or pneumothorax on the right with air-fluid level in the posterior aspect of the lung. Massive generalized right-sided pleural thickening with slight decrease of the right hemithorax. Fibrotic changes of the lung parenchyma. On the left, there is no abnormality of the pleura or lung parenchyma. The left aspect of the heart border is unremarkable.
